title: Agriculture Technology Revolutionizes The Way We Raise Cattle!

tasks.task: Herding a large cattle herd using a helicopter.
subtasks: Coordinating with the helicopter pilot to gather around 1,500 cattle over a 372-mile area.
Watching the herd from the helicopter to assess their condition and movements.
Using GPS technology to track the herd's location and plan the gathering route.
Maneuvering the helicopter to create a visual guide for the herd, directing them towards the designated point.
Coordinating with ground crew in pick-up trucks to assist in steering the cattle towards the gathering area.

tasks.task: Managing cattle herds through large-scale operations.
subtasks: Using helicopters to replace traditional labor-intensive methods, such as horseback riding.
Applying drone technology for herding and monitoring crops.
Using drones to herd cattle in vast areas.
Employing drones to monitor crop conditions and detect pest or irrigation issues.

tasks.task: Utilizing sensor systems and software for livestock monitoring.
subtasks: Tracking the health, weight, and productivity of individual animals.
Optimizing the farming process to minimize disease risks and improve product quality.

tasks.task: Breeding hybrid cattle breeds for higher meat yields.
subtasks: Crossbreeding local resilient breeds with high-yield varieties.
Enhancing meat quality through natural grazing and grass-based nutrition.
Inspecting calves at markets to assess their health and behavior.
Conducting transactions at cattle markets and transporting calves to new farms.
Collecting and storing milk from dairy cattle.
Using traditional and modern milking methods.
Filtering and transporting fresh milk or preparing it for coagulation.

tasks.task: Adapting to climatic challenges in cattle farming.
subtasks: Moving cattle to higher pastures during heatwaves and to shelters during winter.
Providing supplemental feed like hay and grains during harsh weather.
Regulating antibiotic and growth hormone use in livestock.
Producing organic and environmentally friendly meat products.
